Services

Services at our spa

At the Golden Spa Saloon, customers can expect exceptional service from highly trained professionals who are dedicated to helping them look and feel their best. 

basic massage

Looking for a basic massage? Look no further than Goldenspasaloon. Our professional team will help you relax and unwind with our expert massage techniques. Book now. Looking for a professional massage? Look no further than Goldenspasaloon! Our basic massage is sure to leave you feeling relaxed and rejuvenated. Book your appointment today.

  • Duration : 45min
  • Price : 1500

Aromatherapy Massage

Experience the ultimate relaxation with Aromatherapy Massage at Goldenspasaloon. Our professional therapists use essential oils to soothe and rejuvenate your body and mind. Book your appointment today. Experience the ultimate relaxation with an aromatherapy massage at Goldenspasaloon. Our professional therapists use essential oils to soothe and rejuvenate your mind and body. Book your appointment now.

  • Duration : 45min
  • Price : 1800

Reflexology

Discover the benefits of reflexology at Goldenspasaloon – the professional destination for your wellness needs. Let our experienced team help you relax and rejuvenate. Book your appointment today. Discover the benefits of reflexology at Goldenspasaloon. Our professional experts use this holistic approach to relieve stress, pain and promote overall wellbeing.

  • Duration : 1 Hour
  • Price : 2500

Swedish Massage

Discover the ultimate relaxation at Goldenspasaloon with our deep tissue massage therapy. Experience the benefits of increased mobility and reduced muscle tension today. Book your appointment now. Experience ultimate relaxation with our deep tissue massage at Golden Spa Saloon. Our professional therapists use advanced techniques to alleviate muscle tension and promote overall wellness. Book your appointment now.

Book your appointment now.

Back Massage

A personalized massage that targets the areas aching for attention A combination of deep pressure as well as light, relaxing strokes leaves you with a renewed sense treatment is enhanced by one of our Aromatherapy Oils of well-being. Your

  • Duration : 30 Min
  • Price : 1000

Balinese Massage

A soothing technique that incorporates gliding, kneading and compression stakes to relas tense muscles. It improves blood flow and Promotes blood circulation. This combina of aromatics is traditionally used to decrease pain in massage muscles is specifically and joints.

  • Duration : 1 Hour
  • Price : 2500

Thai Massage

Experience the ultimate relaxation with our Thai massage services at Goldenspasaloon. Our professional therapists will leave you feeling rejuvenated and renewed. Book your appointment today. Discover the ultimate relaxation experience at Goldenspasaloon with authentic Thai massage techniques. Trust our professionals to soothe your body and refresh your mind. Book your appointment now.

  • Duration : 1 Hour
  • Price : 3000
